name: Gae Bolg
shortDescription: The Barbed Spear of Cu Chulainn, the Belly Spear of Death
fullDescription:
The Barbed Spear of Cu Chulainn, the Belly Spear of Death The Gae Bolg (also spelled Gae Bulg or Gae Bulga) is the legendary spear of Cu Chulainn,
                    Ireland's greatest mythological hero. This terrible weapon, made from the bones of a
                    sea monster, inflicted wounds that were invariably fatal. Its name translates variously
                    as "belly spear," "spear of mortal pain," or "barbed spear," all indicating its gruesome
                    lethality.

properties.name: Origin
properties.value: Made from bones of sea monster Coinchenn

properties.name: Special Attack
properties.value: Thrown with the foot, creates 30 barbs inside victim
